transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir kaise hain aap?
Executive: Badhiya sir.
Customer: Ji, Chetan Industries se baat kar rahe hain na sir?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Maine ek trade liya hua hai sir 50,000 ka uska stop payment karwana hai. To ye maine karwa diya hai wo lagana mat.
Executive: Kya issue aa raha hai sir please bataiye.
Customer: Aapse sir one month ho gaya hai. Ji.
Executive: Na meri services dhang se start hui hai, na portal update hua hai, na 20 baar call kar chuka hu.
Executive: Isse to MDC wala mera basic plan tha wohi chal hi raha tha. Aap logo ke kehne se maine isko TrustSeal mein convert karwaya, lakh rupya, sawa lakh rupya diya uske baad bhi same sthiti wapis koi phone karne wala hi nahi hai.
Customer: Sir actually main aapko batata hu basically jo aapke account manager tha wo available nahi hai sir teen char din se. Aap mujhe bataiye sir ek baar main kaam kara deta hu aapka please bataiye mereko.
Executive: Sir mera account update karwaye, mereko jo promises kiye the wo pure karwaye uske baad ye check lagwana aap isko lagana mat. Aapka ya kal ki date ka hai?
Customer: Shayad kal ki date ka hai I think.
Executive: Haan kal ki date ka hai to aap isko please mat lagwaiyega. Mera kaam nahi hoga to main isko clear nahi karwaunga.
Customer: Sir kaam aap jo bhi employee hai aapke aate rehte hai, jaate rehte hai usse hume koi lena dena nahi hai. IndiaMART ko dete hai hum to payment na to hume to IndiaMART ki taraf se response aana chahiye.
Executive: Sir mujhe thoda sa time dijiye.
Customer: Na product na product services update hui hai usme kuch bhi update nahi hua mera. 10 baar call kar diya bola sir Diwali ke baad karte hai, Diwali ke baad karte hai ab Diwali bhi nikal gayi uske baad mein.
Executive: Please ek baar apna number batana mereko please.
Customer: 960
Executive: 960
Customer: 22
Executive: 22
Customer: 33
Executive: 33
Customer: 0101


Executive: Dekhiye sir aapke paas ek hello ka message aaya kya?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ek maine hello karke dala hai aapko.
Customer: Haan aa gaya.
Executive: Aa gaya na? Ji ab ek second aap mujhe bataiye to aapne mereko bataya product updation pending hai.
Customer: Product images bata rahe hai na sir aap images purani dali hui hai.
Executive: Ye iska saari purani dali hui hai. Mera jo profile banana tha unhone bola ki wo sab YouTube wale video promotion wagera sab hum karke denge ispe ispe kuch bhi kaam nahi hua mera MDC wala profile hi chal raha hai abhi tak.
Customer: PDF promotion bola tha main karwa raha hu.
Executive: Haan. 50 bylead bhi nahi mili hai please.
Executive: 50 buylead bhi nahi hui sir abhi tak?
Customer: Nahi kuch nahi mila sir.
Executive: Nahi sir kuch buyleads to mil gayi hongi ek second rukiye.
Customer: Sir buylead daily mil rahi hai do mil rahi hai par mereko kuch nahi mila. Uske jo 50 unhone bola tha yearly 50 milegi wo nahi mili.
Executive: Ek second rukiye sir yearly kuch leads aapko allocate ho gayi hongi sir ek second ruk jaiye main bata deta hu.
Customer: Sir 10 ya 15 kuch lead hui thi jo hamara portal activate nahi hua tha us samay tak valid thi wo.
Executive: Ek second rukiye ek second rukiye sir. Ah ek second rukiye call pe please.

Executive: Weekly to mil hi rahi hai khair. Rukiye ek second.
Customer: Haan weekly mil rahi hai wo to.

Executive: Ek second ruk jaiye please bas.

Executive: Sir 9 tarikh ko 20 mili thi aapko.
Customer: Haan wo 20 hi mili hui hai sir hamara update nahi hua tha chalu nahi hua tha usme maine bola tha to unhone kaha sir hum allocate karwa dete hai aapko.
Executive: Uske alawa 50 boli gayi thi 20 ke alawa?
Customer: Haan uske alawa 50 boli gayi thi wo to aise thi ki aap inko chalao do char din jab tak hum isko update kar dete hai aapka profile.
Executive: Achha achha thik hai 50 buylead pending hai PDF promotion pending hai. Aur haan bas yahi tha sir.
Customer: Aur bahut sare product add karne hai mereko isme.
Executive: Bataye sir aap hume bhej denge kya?
Customer: Main bhej nahi dunga sir online dekh ke add karwaye to main ek ek cheez ko mera 50 60 product hai to main usko add karwao.
Executive: Matlab aap nahi nahi hum add to hum hi karenge main keh raha hu ki aap name bhej denge unki images images ya kaise matlab images Google se leni hai kis tarike se thoda bataye.
Customer: Sir wo online rahenge to main add karwa dunga wo consult karke hi ho payega. To main abhi aadhe ghante mein system mein pahunch ke aapko callback kar deta hu ya to to aap jo bhi photo bhejenge main aapko photo dal dunga uske.
Executive: Main dekho ab ek ek baar aap apna wo check karo ek baar apna WhatsApp.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek minute. Isme dekhiye ek baar aapne dekha ek to product images pending hai sir wo karni hai hume right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: PDF promotion pending hai wo likh ke de dijiye mereko. Haan ji ek baar open kar liya kya? Product image pending PDF promotion pending 50 buylead pending hai aur aapne bola hai ki product product add bhi karane hai aapko. Aap mujhe ye bataiye ye likha TrustSeal wala TrustSeal ka to sir certificate aapke paas TrustSeal ka to aa gaya hoga certificate aapke paas.
Customer: Nahi unhone bola tha ki aapka jo page hai na on page wo bhi kuch changes hoga usme.
Executive: Kya hoga?
Customer: Ye home page hai na jo abhi ispe hai sir TrustSeal ka certificate aapka laga hua hai.
Executive: Achha laga hua hai? Main dikha dunga ek baar aap video meeting pe aa jaiye kis time pe aayenge aap main aapko saari cheeze dikha dunga aur kya bola tha ek baar ye bhi main likh leta hu.
Customer: Main saara product ki ek baar image dekh ke apan 11:00 baje 11:30 baje connect karte hai.
Executive: TrustSeal dikhana hai aapko mereko? Hmm aur aapne mereko bola hai images aap mereko products update update karenge kuch 50 60 product aap update karenge right?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Product need to add. Add karne hai na sir? Naye product. Add karne hai. Ji. Ye dekh lijiye ek baar.

Executive: Ek to TrustSeal show karna hai mereko aapko aur ek product add kara ke dena hai yahi hai sir? Ji. Ji.
Executive: Ab ek kaam kar lete hai sir aap mujhe batao kitni der mein aap free ho jaoge abhi 10:00 baj rahe hai 10:30 baje laga lo aapko wapas call.
Customer: 11:30 baje mereko.
Executive: 11:30. 11:30 mein aapko ek video meeting ka link bhejunga. Thik hai na ye mera padh lijiyega sir Shubham naam hai mera main Piyush ka manager baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Okay okay thik hai. Aap mera number bhi save kar lijiyega main aapko 11:30 baje video meeting ka link bhejunga. Aadhe se jyada dekho main aapko bata deta hu kya kya kaam aapke aaj kar dunga. Product ki images aapki aaj karke de dunga. PDF wala kaam aapka aaj karke de dunga TrustSeal aapko dikha dunga aur product add bhi aaj kar lenge baith ke. Lekin jo 50 buylead ka kaam hai sir wo mereko kya hai ki approval leke dalna padega wo kal tak hoga wo actually aaj ek din ka time lagta hai us process mein. Wo jo bhi unhone liya hua hai na usko leke mereko mail dalna tha unhone na. Liya to hua hai sir mereko performa fill karna padta hai online. Online performa fill karunga. Wo jo bhi aapke end se aap positively kijiye koi issue nahi hai. Wo main kar dunga lekin aapka ye kaam ye char kaam jo hai aapne total paanch kaam bataye paanch mein se char aaj kar denge hum log. Baki aap bechint rahiye jo cheeze boli gayi hai. Ye aapko 11:30 baje karta hu. 11:30 main khud kar lunga sir aapko karne ki zarurat nahi padegi mere end se khud call aa jayega aapko. Aap bas ye dekhiyega is wale number se hi call karunga mera number dusra rahega recording call se karunga aap phone uda lijiyega 11:30. Thik hai aap is WhatsApp wale number se? Ye wala hi save kar lo sir koi dikkat nahi isse bhi kar lunga main aapko call aap number save kar lo main aapko call kar lunga ye wala number mera save kar lo aap isi se kar lunga main aapko bata dunga. Okay okay.
Executive: Thik hai na?
Customer: Ji. Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to stop payment of 50,000 trade.

- Services not started, portal not updated.

- MDC plan was better than TrustSeal.

- Account not updated, promises not fulfilled.

- Product and services not updated.

- Not received 50 buyleads.

- Wants to add more products.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issues.

- Agreed to a video meeting at 11:30 AM.

- Agreed to update product images and PDF.

- Agreed to show TrustSeal and add products.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a video meeting link at 11:30 AM.

- Executive will call from a recording call number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- stop payment, trustseal, product update, buyleads, pdf promotion
